comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Hugh Gibson was secretary to the Belgian Ambassador Brand Whitlock and then the first United States Minister to Poland (see the New-York tribune., May 04, 1919, Page 3 with the same photo) His wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hugh_S._Gibson Brand Whitlock:

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: B-59: Thanks for adding more to Mr. Gibson's story, and for citing your sources.  We will add more detail to the catalog record.
